en.docTitle: Hussein Zayat — Backend Consultant & Technical Lead

about.title: About me
about.p1: Senior backend consultant and technical leader specialized in .NET 7/8/9, Azure, and microservices. I help teams build scalable APIs, modernize legacy systems, and ship with confidence using automated CI/CD pipelines.
about.p2: Recent work includes consulting for CNH Industrial & Iveco (Azure, microservices, SQL/Cosmos DB) and HEABC in Canada (backend modernization and DocuSign integration). I’m available for long-term freelance collaborations (remote-first).

cloud.title: Cloud Solutions
cloud.text: Helping businesses move to the cloud with confidence—designing secure, scalable, and future-ready cloud solutions.

web.title: Web development
web.text: Modern and scalable web applications built with high-quality code and design at a professional level.

mobile.title: Mobile apps
mobile.text: Native and cross-platform mobile solutions that bring your ideas to life on any device.

lead.title: Technical Leadership (Tech Lead / Team Lead)
lead.text: Mentoring & code reviews, architectural guidance, sprint planning, delivery governance, and stakeholder alignment to keep teams fast and focused.

skills.title: My skills
skills.azure: Azure (Service Bus, Blob, Data Lake, Cosmos DB)
skills.langs: Languages & Frameworks: Python, Kotlin, Java, JavaScript, EF, ABP, Flutter, OData

it.docTitle: Hussein Zayat — Consulente Backend & Technical Lead

about.title: Chi sono
about.p1: Consulente backend senior e technical leader specializzato in .NET 7/8/9, Azure e microservizi. Aiuto i team a creare API scalabili, modernizzare sistemi legacy e rilasciare con sicurezza tramite pipeline CI/CD automatizzate.
about.p2: Tra i progetti recenti: consulenza per CNH Industrial & Iveco (Azure, microservizi, SQL/Cosmos DB) e HEABC in Canada (modernizzazione backend e integrazione DocuSign). Disponibile per collaborazioni freelance di lungo periodo (remote-first).

cloud.title: Soluzioni Cloud
cloud.text: Supporto alla migrazione in cloud con soluzioni sicure, scalabili e pronte per il futuro.

web.title: Sviluppo Web
web.text: Applicazioni web moderne e scalabili, con codice e design di livello professionale.

mobile.title: App Mobile
mobile.text: Soluzioni native e cross-platform per dare vita alle idee su ogni dispositivo.

lead.title: Technical Leadership (Tech Lead / Team Lead)
lead.text: Mentoring e code review, guida architetturale, pianificazione sprint, governance del delivery e allineamento stakeholder.
